original_title: น้ำ ผีนองสยองขวัญ
overview: The story centers to Mook and Charlie, two uncommon buddies who befriend in an odd circumstance. Mook was a swimmer who lost her swimmer friends from an accident which causes her to be afraid of water. When Mook is hit by Charlie's car and becomes am.
tagline: Get ready for a scream of a time.
title: H2-Oh!
